import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { io } from 'socket.io-client' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { Col, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Messages from './components/Messages' import AddNewMsg from './components/AddNewMsg' import './App.css'; function App() { useEffect(() => { const socket = io('http://localhost:5000') }, []) const [tweets, setTweets] = useState([ { name: "lala", data: "papa" }, { name: "nana", data: "rara" } ]) const addTweet = (msg) => { setTweets(prev => ([...prev, msg])) } return

Welcome to PinkChat

Group Chat
; } export default App;
